name: Seven Seas (Stephann)
description:
You have 7 minutes to search for 7 hidden undersea treasures across 7 seas. Your ship emits stronger signals if you are close to treasures. Please enable sound to hear radar signals.
Controls:

Move: Arrows or WASD
Search: Space bar or Z or Control

This is my first game ever. It was developed with Godot Engine for submission to Godot Wild Engine #32, which theme was "Seven".

Credits:
Programming & Art: me (stephannv)
Font: Stacked Pixel (monkopus.itch.io)
Sounds: Minimalistic Loops (gooseninja.itch.io)
